properties.areaDesc: Melville Foothills; Beartooth Foothills; Southern Wheatland; Livingston Area; Judith Gap; Northern Sweet Grass
properties.headline: High Wind Watch issued January 2 at 12:29PM MST until January 5 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Billings MT
properties.description:
* WHAT...Westerly winds with gusts 55-65 mph possible.

* WHERE...Portions of central and south central Montana.

* WHEN...From late tonight through Saturday night.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile
vehicles and those pulling trailers.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Best potential for high winds Friday night
and Saturday. High winds may continue into Sunday or Monday as
well.
properties.instruction:
Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this
situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe
location prior to the onset of winds.

Additional graphics for this hazard can be found at
http://www.weather.gov/billings

NWSheadline: HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH LATE SATURDAY NIGHT
